title: Janna walks up and presses W
body: Wow great balancing their Riot.  So much interaction.  So much skill expression.

replies.body:
"Omg Riot, Janna just sits back and shields her ADC in lane!"

Ok, well we'll give her some extra damage and weaken the shielding so she has to be more interactive.

"Omg Riot, Janna just walks up and attacks me!"

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

first: there*
second: 
Janna's W fits her story and her kit.
she needs the speed to chase enemies and (or) follow up to adc faster, she sacrifices her own speed to slow someone else down which puts her in a vulnerable state without an adc.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A9dgQ7LM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-06T05:47:51.672+0000)
>
> first: there*
> second: 
> Janna's W fits her story and her kit.
> she needs the speed to chase enemies and (or) follow up to adc faster, she sacrifices her own speed to slow someone else down which puts her in a vulnerable state without an adc.

why did you mention story first? you realize nobody actually reads the lore right?

> [{quoted}](name=Th1sIsASmurfLMAO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A9dgQ7LM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-06T05:56:38.314+0000)

> why did you mention story first? you realize nobody actually reads the lore right?

you realize that that there are youtube channels made for lore? and the fact that their is an entire sub-board for Story?
for champions i don't play that often, i care about lore then gameplay.

> for champions i don't play that often, i care about lore then gameplay.

wow youtube channels? Surely that is important in gameplay. Lore affects gameplay!

> [{quoted}](name=Th1sIsASmurfLMAO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A9dgQ7LM,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-06T06:05:29.034+0000)

Have you considered the fact that a game isn't only based on GAMEPLAY and more on the fantasy of the game.
No explanation, no details. Ill be the only idiot responding.
